contentrichtext.text: '''EFI''' may refer to: {{TOCright}} ==Companies== *[[Electronics for Imaging]] ==People== *[[Efi Arazi]], Israeli businessman and high-tech entrepreneur ==Computing== *[[Extensible Firmware Interface]], a firmware interface specification, predecessor of UEFI ==Organizations and institutions== *[[Enrico Fermi Institute]], a research centre by the University of Chicago *[[Equestrian Federation of Ireland]], an equestrian sporting body *[[European Forest Institute]], a research centre *[[Expeditionary Forces Institute]], the overseas branch of the British NAAFI *[[European Federation for Immunogenetics]], a scientific society *[[European Friends of Israel]], a political organization *[[Evangelical Friends International]], a Christian religious organization *[[Enzyme Function Initiative]], a project funded by the National Institutes of Health (NIH) Glue Grant ==Technology== *[[Electronic fuel injection]], an internal combustion engine technology *[[Exploding foil initiator]], a detonator type {{disambig}}
